overview: An Angel inspired by the Duino Poems by R. M. Rilke wanders through the ruins of a contemporary Hell, a city recently destroyed by an earthquake where a group of damned is imprisoned. The film, with a visionary approach, is a journey inside the ruins of every human being. It's shot in l"Aquila, the Italian city destroyed by an earthquake in 2009 and not yet rebuilt.
title: Mancanza-Inferno
